insert.if: INSERT INTO hk_lecture_board(bno, lbnum, btype, title, content, writer, ref, re_step, re_level) VALUES(seq_hklboard.NEXTVAL, seq_hklboard_notice.NEXTVAL, #{btype}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, 0, 1, 0)

INSERT INTO hk_lecture_board(bno, lbnum, btype, title, content, writer, ref, re_step, re_level) VALUES(seq_hklboard.NEXTVAL, seq_hklboard_qna.NEXTVAL, #{btype}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, seq_hklboard.CURRVAL, 1, 0)
INSERT INTO hk_lecture_board(bno, lbnum, title, content, writer, ref, re_step, re_level) VALUES(seq_hklboard.NEXTVAL, seq_hklboard_normal.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, 0, 1, 0)

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM hk_lecture_board WHERE lbnum=#{lbnum} AND btype=#{btype}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hk_lecture_board(bno, lbnum, btype, title,content,writer,ref,re_step,re_level) VALUES(seq_hklboard.NEXTVAL, seq_hklboard_qna.NEXTVAL, #{btype}, #{title},#{content},#{writer},#{ref},#{re_step},#{re_level})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum AS rnum, A.* FROM (SELECT title, bno FROM hk_lecture_board WHERE btype=#{btype} ORDER BY regdate DESC ) A) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 5
